name: Pool Boy
description:
I spent three hours and forty minutes working on this.

I had more I wanted to add. Maybe I will when the Game Jam has concluded.

Premise: You are a "Pool Boy" in charge of the pool.

Watch your pH levels.
Use "pH Down" by right-clicking mouse or pressing 'alt'.

Clean up the Pool.
Scoop up the 'trash' with your net by left-clicking mouse, or pressing 'ctrl' key.

You can also play with a gamepad.

Move left and right with arrow keys or WASD.

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
